product_name: LAMO Sheepskin Scuff Slippers - Women's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: With plush sheepskin linings, the LAMO Sheepskin Scuff slippers keep your feet warm during relaxing days at home. Suede leather uppers provide durable, flexible support and structure; slip-on style provides easy on/off. Plush sheepskin linings insulate while remaining breathable, ideal for cool or warm days. Thermoplastic rubber outsoles deliver reliable traction for indoor/outdoor use. Closeout.
short_description: With plush sheepskin linings, the LAMO Sheepskin Scuff slippers keep your feet warm during relaxing days at home.
